summary: Resolved 7 conflicted files by adopting origin/main's newer API throughout: NutritionBar now uses Tailwind/CSS bars with label+lowerIsBetter props instead of Recharts; ComparisonPanel uses starbucksDrink/costaDrink props with getNutritionRows and a table layout; CostaVsStarbucksPage adds FilterBar and SearchBox imports. All tests updated to match the new component APIs.
strategyUsed: Chose origin/main for all conflicts. The already-staged ComparisonPanel.test.tsx used the origin/main prop names (starbucksDrink/costaDrink) and aria-label ('Drink comparison panel'), making origin/main the authoritative implementation. NutritionBar.tsx origin/main replaces Recharts with a pure CSS/Tailwind approach matching the origin/main NutritionBar tests. docs/components.md was merged to include FilterBar/SearchBox utility docs and the correct NutritionBar/ComparisonPanel API documentation from origin/main. DrinkCatalog.test.tsx uses less-strict regex patterns from origin/main to better match actual component aria-labels.
